posts.post_content:
Hi all- I'm looking for certain T206 commons (non HOF), thought I'd ask:)

 Specifically, Magee portrait or Bat, Kling portrait, Lobert portrait, Oberlin, 
 Pattee, Powers, Burch Batting, Durham, Beaumont portrait.

 What is important-

 1) Nice looking example for the assigned grade

 2) No trimmed or altered cards

 3) Graded or raw both fine. Looking for cards in "3" to "5" range.

 Not important-

 1) Card back. Pied or SCap are just fine, other backs great of course.

 If anyone is willing to part with any of these, please PM. Thanks!

 Trent King
